tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Dental Fillings,
review:
Dr. Harsh Shah is an experienced and registered Endodontist meaning he has specialized in Root Canal Treatment.  Dr. Harsh has done my Re-RCT because I had a bad decay after an old RCT. It was so bad that other doctors would have removed my tooth and it wouldn't cost much. Dr. Harsh has taken all the measurements of my tooth to save it. He has cleaned all of my canals and completed it explaining each possible step that he is performing so that I remain informed. Sir is well aware of what are my pain points in and around the tooth, so while treating he informs me before hand. 
Doing Re-RCT took me 2 sessions (according to my convenience) due to my tooth complexity and it involved multiple X-rays. I get a reminder of my appointments so that I don't miss out the procedure. I would recommend doctors like Dr. Harsh to all of my friends and relatives just because of his communication and experience. These two things makes him stand out.
Also, behind operating my tooth, it's the entire team with the doctor I'd thank.
reply_text: Thank you so much Seema for such kind words. It really means a lot. Wishing you the best always, keep smiling :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Went there for  treatment of cavity in tooth of my wife. The doctor Suggested RCT and an amount of 5800 for the RCT treatment was told to us...After finishing the RCT they said some other doctor will do the filling and we choose not to go for any dental cap and asked them to fill the cavity for which they charged 1800 separately. This practice is not there anywhere else....The RCT cost always includes the filling cost...***** **** **** ***** *** ** ***** ***** *** *** ***** ** ******* ***** **** ****r....Clarity of cost of treatment is a big miss there....Not recommended for someone who is visitiNg a dentist for the first time....Because u will never be told about the clarity and steps of treatments and cost thereon...
reply_text: I'm sorry about the experience you had about the fees. I'm however glad that you are happy with the quality of treatment provided, as that is always top priority for us. Keep smiling always :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Its was a painless experience as always, docters always treat with care and patience and give proper solutions to your problems and queries of dental issues. I will always recommend Crowns and Root  to others.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Without any single pain enjoying the root canal treatment easily done. In only 3 visit. Very good hygiene atmosphere with dynamic instrument uses for treatment like a very specialist in root canal. In busy time schedule got it appointment adjustable on my time. Thank you very much...

Harsh is very ************* *** friendly Doctor.  I went to his clinic for Root Canal treatment.  On every visit he made sure that I am comfortable. He handled pain area of my tooth quite gently. 
My last two appointment was taken care by Dr. Jigna. She is brilliant and polite too. She did cleaning of my teeth very well and informed me to take care of it and precautions I need to follow in future to keep my teeth in good and healthy conditions.
They both make sure that their patient is aware of what treatment they have been given and what imapct its going to have which builds trust in patient and he feels that he is in safe hand.
My entire root canal treatment was very smooth.
Last but not least their staff is very good and friendly too.
I would say Crown and Root Canal clinics Doctor and their staff compliment each other very well which is very important.
reply_text:
Wow we are so glad to read this feedback. Thanks so much for taking the time to write
 this.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Harsh and Dr. Jigna are very professional. They make the patient feel comfortable during the root canal treatment and also advises on after care. Doctor also advices on how to take care of your teeth to prevent further damage. There are many option’s available for teeth aesthetics. 
What I liked about the appointments were that I did not have to wait for my turn. Else other dentists call you at a particular time and have you wait for an hour before treating you. 
The cons were injections during the RC which I hated in my mouth but the doctor was kind enough to joke around it and lightened the mood. 
I also realised that once a year dental check up is a must since there were cavities which would have gone unnoticed and would turn into an RC. All cavities were detected and treated proactively.
reply_text: Thanks so much Larissa, we are so happy to read this and wish we get many more patients as smiling as you!!
